items.title: Fed's Waller, a candidate for chair, sees potential for half-point cut if labor market weakens further
items.description: Waller said he believes the Fed can use its power over rates to stave off further labor market weakening. "So, let's get on with it," he said.

items.title: Affirm's stock soars 15% on earnings, revenue beat
items.description: Affirm's earnings per share of 20 cents for the quarter was almost double what Wall Street expected.

items.title: How Italy's banking M&A wave started crashing
items.description: The merger fever that's gripped Italy's banking sector showed signs of abating this summer — but its end isn't nigh.
